AT.name: Child of Light™
AT.description: Child of Light ist die Geschichte von Aurora, einem Mädchen, das im Jahr 1895 aufwächst. Als sie eines Morgens erwacht, findet sie sich unversehns auf den Märchenkontinent Lemuria wieder. Um wieder nach Hause zu gelangen, muss sie die dunklen Kreaturen der Königin der Nacht bekämpfen, die Sonne, Mond und Sterne gestohlen haben. Hilf ihr, das Königreich Lemuria vor der Tyrannei der Dunklen Königin zu retten, indem du die drei Quellen des Lichts wiederbeschaffst.

AU.name: Child of Light™
AU.description: Child of Light is a coming-of-age story about a young girl named Aurora from 1895 Austria who wakes up to find herself on the lost fairytale continent of Lemuria. To get home she must fight against the dark creatures of the Queen of the Night, who have stolen the sun, the moon and the stars. Help her on her quest to save the Kingdom of Lemuria from the Dark Queen's tyranny by bringing back the three sources of Light!

BG.name: Child of Light™
BG.description: Child of Light is a coming-of-age story about a young girl named Aurora from 1895 Austria who wakes up to find herself on the lost fairytale continent of Lemuria. To get home she must fight against the dark creatures of the Queen of the Night, who have stolen the sun, the moon and the stars. Help her on her quest to save the Kingdom of Lemuria from the Dark Queen's tyranny by bringing back the three sources of Light!

BE.name: Child of Light™
BE.description: Child of Light conte le passage à l'âge adulte de la jeune Aurora, une jeune fille de la fin du 19e siècle, dont l'âme se retrouve transportée dans le monde féérique et oublié de Lemuria. Pour rentrer chez elle, elle devra affronter les sombres créatures de la Reine Noire, qui a volé le soleil, le lune et les étoiles du Royaume. Embarquez dans une quête palpitante à travers le monde poétique de Lemuria pour retrouver les 3 sources de lumière et vaincre la tyrannique Reine Noire !

ES.name: Child of Light™
ES.description: Child of Light es una historia sobre la adolescencia de Aurora, una joven princesa que despierta en el mágico mundo de Lemuria. Para volver a casa, tendrá que luchar contra las peligrosas criaturas de la Reina de la Oscuridad, que ha robado el poder del Sol, la Luna y las Estrellas. Ayúdala en su aventura para salvar el Reino de Lemuria de la tiranía de la Reina de la Oscuridad recuperando las tres fuentes de Luz.

IT.name: Child of Light™
IT.description: Child of Light è la favola di Aurora, una bambina austriaca che nel 1895 si sveglia in un mondo fatato chiamato Lemuria. Per tornare a casa dovrà combattere le creature oscure della Regina della Notte, che ha rubato il sole, la luna e le stelle. Aiutala nella sua missione per salvare il Regno di Lemuria dalla tirannia della Regina della Notte e salvare le tre fonti di Luce!

NL.name: Child of Light™
NL.description: Child of Light is een verhaal over volwassen worden als Aurora. Jij bent een jong meisje uit Oostenrijk in 1895 die wakker wordt in het verloren sprookjesrijk Lemuria. Om terug te keren naar huis, moet ze het opnemen tegen de duistere wezens van de Queen of the Night, die de zon, maan en sterren heeft gestolen. Help Aurora in haar avontuur om het koninkrijk Lemuria te redden van de Dark Queen door de lichtbronnen terug te brengen!

NZ.name: Child of Light™

To get home she must fight against the dark creatures of the Queen of the Night, who have stolen the sun, the moon and the stars. Help her on her quest to save the Kingdom of Lemuria from the Dark Queen's tyranny by bringing back the three sources of Light!

PT.name: Child of Light™
PT.description: Child of Light é uma história de passagem à idade adulta que decorre em 1895, na Áustria, sobre uma jovem chamada Aurora que acorda no lendário continente perdido de Lemuria. Para chegar a casa ela terá de combater contra as criaturas sombrias da Dark Queen, que roubaram o sol, a lua e as estrelas. Ajuda-a na sua demanda para recuperar as três fontes de Luz e salvar o Reino de Lemuria da tirania da Dark Queen!

RU.name: Child of Light™
RU.description: Девочка Аврора, родом из Австрии конца XIX века, просыпается в волшебной стране Лемурии. Ей предстоит сразиться с темными созданиями Королевы Ночи, что похитила солнце, луну и звезды. Аврора свергнет Королеву Ночи и вернет Лемурии 3 источника света!
